Class DrawableElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.swing.gcanvas.DrawableElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Border, DefaultBaseFunction, GraphicHistogram, InfoLayer, MinMaxLines

    public abstract class DrawableElement
extends Object
    Clase base para los gráficos a dibujar sobre el canvas 14-oct-2007
